CustomField.formula: IF( Prime_Location_Medium_High_Foot_Traffic__c , 1, 0) + IF( Finances_Healthy_Business__c , 1, 0) + IF( Concept_Alignment_with_Brand__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Concept_Knowledge_of_Ingredients__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Concept_Opportunity_for_All_Lines__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Concept_Sustainability__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Mkt_Sales_Existing_Website_Webshop__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Mkt_Sales_Opport_Workshops_events__c , 1, 0)+ IF( Mkt_Sales_Social_Media_Platforms__c , 1, 0)+ IF( MKT_Sales_Staff_Trained_in_Makeup__c , 1, 0)
CustomField.label: IAK Pre Scoring
